PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SensorTypeSoundSensor
PropertySetDef.Definition: A device that senses or detects sound. HISTORY: SoundSensorSensorSetPoint changed to SetPointSound. Range, accuracy and time constant deleted.

PropertyDef.Name: SetPointSound
PropertyDef.Definition: The sound pressure value to be sensed. Use IfcPropertyBoundedValue.SetPointValue to set the set point value.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 感知される音圧。 セットポイント値を置くために、IfcPropertyBoundedValue.SetPointValueを使用する。

PsetDefinitionAliases.PsetDefinitionAlias: 音を感知または検出するデバイス。
